00034 namespace Ogre {
00042     enum PixelFormat
00043     {
00045         PF_UNKNOWN = 0,
00047         PF_L8 = 1,
00048         PF_BYTE_L = PF_L8,
00050         PF_L16 = 2,
00051         PF_SHORT_L = PF_L16,
00053         PF_A8 = 3,
00054         PF_BYTE_A = PF_A8,
00056         PF_A4L4 = 4,
00058         PF_BYTE_LA = 5,
00060         PF_R5G6B5 = 6,
00062         PF_B5G6R5 = 7,
00064         PF_R3G3B2 = 31,
00066         PF_A4R4G4B4 = 8,
00068         PF_A1R5G5B5 = 9,
00070         PF_R8G8B8 = 10,
00072         PF_B8G8R8 = 11,
00074         PF_A8R8G8B8 = 12,
00076         PF_A8B8G8R8 = 13,
00078         PF_B8G8R8A8 = 14,
00080         PF_R8G8B8A8 = 28,
00083         PF_X8R8G8B8 = 26,
00086         PF_X8B8G8R8 = 27,
00087 #if OGRE_ENDIAN == OGRE_ENDIAN_BIG
00088 
00089         PF_BYTE_RGB = PF_R8G8B8,
00091         PF_BYTE_BGR = PF_B8G8R8,
00093         PF_BYTE_BGRA = PF_B8G8R8A8,
00095         PF_BYTE_RGBA = PF_R8G8B8A8,
00096 #else
00097 
00098         PF_BYTE_RGB = PF_B8G8R8,
00100         PF_BYTE_BGR = PF_R8G8B8,
00102         PF_BYTE_BGRA = PF_A8R8G8B8,
00104         PF_BYTE_RGBA = PF_A8B8G8R8,
00105 #endif        
00106 
00107         PF_A2R10G10B10 = 15,
00109         PF_A2B10G10R10 = 16,
00111         PF_DXT1 = 17,
00113         PF_DXT2 = 18,
00115         PF_DXT3 = 19,
00117         PF_DXT4 = 20,
00119         PF_DXT5 = 21,
00120         // 16-bit pixel format, 16 bits (float) for red
00121         PF_FLOAT16_R = 32,
00122         // 48-bit pixel format, 16 bits (float) for red, 16 bits (float) for green, 16 bits (float) for blue
00123         PF_FLOAT16_RGB = 22,
00124         // 64-bit pixel format, 16 bits (float) for red, 16 bits (float) for green, 16 bits (float) for blue, 16 bits (float) for alpha
00125         PF_FLOAT16_RGBA = 23,
00126         // 32-bit pixel format, 32 bits (float) for red
00127         PF_FLOAT32_R = 33,
00128         // 96-bit pixel format, 32 bits (float) for red, 32 bits (float) for green, 32 bits (float) for blue
00129         PF_FLOAT32_RGB = 24,
00130         // 128-bit pixel format, 32 bits (float) for red, 32 bits (float) for green, 32 bits (float) for blue, 32 bits (float) for alpha
00131         PF_FLOAT32_RGBA = 25,
00132         // 32-bit, 2-channel s10e5 floating point pixel format, 16-bit green, 16-bit red
00133         PF_FLOAT16_GR = 35,
00134         // 64-bit, 2-channel floating point pixel format, 32-bit green, 32-bit red
00135         PF_FLOAT32_GR = 36,
00136         // Depth texture format
00137         PF_DEPTH = 29,
00138         // 64-bit pixel format, 16 bits for red, green, blue and alpha
00139         PF_SHORT_RGBA = 30,
00140         // 32-bit pixel format, 16-bit green, 16-bit red
00141         PF_SHORT_GR = 34,
00142         // 48-bit pixel format, 16 bits for red, green and blue
00143         PF_SHORT_RGB = 37,
00145         PF_PVRTC_RGB2 = 38,
00147         PF_PVRTC_RGBA2 = 39,
00149         PF_PVRTC_RGB4 = 40,
00151         PF_PVRTC_RGBA4 = 41,
00153         PF_R8 = 42,
00155         PF_RG8 = 43,
00156         // Number of pixel formats currently defined
00157         PF_COUNT = 44
00158     };
00159     typedef vector<PixelFormat>::type PixelFormatList;
00160 
00164     enum PixelFormatFlags {
00165         // This format has an alpha channel
00166         PFF_HASALPHA        = 0x00000001,      
00167         // This format is compressed. This invalidates the values in elemBytes,
00168         // elemBits and the bit counts as these might not be fixed in a compressed format.
00169         PFF_COMPRESSED    = 0x00000002,
00170         // This is a floating point format
00171         PFF_FLOAT           = 0x00000004,         
00172         // This is a depth format (for depth textures)
00173         PFF_DEPTH           = 0x00000008,
00174         // Format is in native endian. Generally true for the 16, 24 and 32 bits
00175         // formats which can be represented as machine integers.
00176         PFF_NATIVEENDIAN    = 0x00000010,
00177         // This is an intensity format instead of a RGB one. The luminance
00178         // replaces R,G and B. (but not A)
00179         PFF_LUMINANCE       = 0x00000020
00180     };
00181     
00183     enum PixelComponentType
00184     {
00185         PCT_BYTE = 0,    
00186         PCT_SHORT = 1,   
00187         PCT_FLOAT16 = 2, 
00188         PCT_FLOAT32 = 3, 
00189         PCT_COUNT = 4    
00190     };
00191     
00197     class _OgreExport PixelBox: public Box, public ImageAlloc {
00198     public:
00200         PixelBox() {}
00201         ~PixelBox() {}
00209         PixelBox(const Box &extents, PixelFormat pixelFormat, void *pixelData=0):
00210             Box(extents), data(pixelData), format(pixelFormat)
00211         {
00212             setConsecutive();
00213         }
00223         PixelBox(size_t width, size_t height, size_t depth, PixelFormat pixelFormat, void *pixelData=0):
00224             Box(0, 0, 0, width, height, depth),
00225             data(pixelData), format(pixelFormat)
00226         {
00227             setConsecutive();
00228         }
00229         
00231         void *data;
00233         PixelFormat format;
00238         size_t rowPitch;
00244         size_t slicePitch;
00245         
00249         void setConsecutive()
00250         {
00251             rowPitch = getWidth();
00252             slicePitch = getWidth()*getHeight();
00253         }
00258         size_t getRowSkip() const { return rowPitch - getWidth(); }
00263         size_t getSliceSkip() const { return slicePitch - (getHeight() * rowPitch); }
00264 
00268         bool isConsecutive() const 
00269         { 
00270             return rowPitch == getWidth() && slicePitch == getWidth()*getHeight(); 
00271         }
00275         size_t getConsecutiveSize() const;
00284         PixelBox getSubVolume(const Box &def) const;
00285         
00291         ColourValue getColourAt(size_t x, size_t y, size_t z);
00292 
00298         void setColourAt(ColourValue const &cv, size_t x, size_t y, size_t z);
00299     };
